idea-plugin.name: Xross Tools Graphic Edit Framework
idea-plugin.description:
Xross Tools idea IDEA Graphic Edit Framework. i.e. Xross Tools IDEA GEF.
It provides common UI widgets and controls for building graphic editors. Inspired by Eclipse GEF and the usage is alike.
